intro.title: Privacy Policy
intro.text: Thank you for visiting the Privacy Policy of SpaceLogic. This explains how we collect, use, and share information about you when you use our Services.

collect.title: Information We Collect
collect.text: We collect contact, account, and usage information, including address and details provided when you create an account.

use.title: How We Use Your Information
use.text: We use your information to improve Services, process transactions, respond to your requests, and comply with legal obligations.

share.title: How We May Share Information
share.text: We may share your data with service providers, in case of business changes, to comply with the law, or with your consent.

security.title: Data Security
security.text: We implement reasonable security measures, but no system is completely secure.

retention.title: Data Retention
retention.text: We retain data as long as necessary for the described purposes or to comply with legal requirements.

age.title: Age Limitations
age.text: Our Services are intended for users aged 18 and older. We do not knowingly collect data from children.

changes.title: Changes to this Policy
changes.text: We may update this policy. Significant changes will be communicated, and continued use of the Services means you accept the changes.

storage.title: Storage of Information in the United States
storage.text: Information may be stored in the US. By using the Services, you consent to this transfer.

contact.title: Contact Us
contact.text: If you have questions, contact us at spacelogic.info@gmail.com.
